Name: Francophile Martini
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Garnish with pineapple wedge on rim.
Review: A simple variation on the vodka-based French Martini adding gin and vermouth to help justify its "Martini" name.
History: Created in June 2011 by yours truly at The Cabinet Room, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Francophile Martini contains 194 calories
